hero.headline: Health Sharing for Individuals & Families
hero.description: Designed for individuals and families who want quality healthcare without the high costs and restrictions of traditional insurance. Get the care you need from the providers you trust.

positioning.title: Healthcare That Works for Real Life
positioning.description: Whether you're self-employed, between jobs, or simply want an alternative to expensive insurance, our health sharing plans provide comprehensive coverage with the flexibility you need.
painPoints: High monthly insurance premiums eating into your budget
Limited provider networks restricting your healthcare choices
Complex insurance processes and endless paperwork
Surprise medical bills and hidden costs
Long wait times for specialist appointments
solutions: Complete freedom to choose any healthcare provider
Simple, transparent process for sharing medical expenses
Direct payment to providers with no surprise bills
Quick access to virtual care and specialists

services.title: Comprehensive Services for Every Need
services.description: From preventive care to emergency services, our health sharing plans cover the full spectrum of your healthcare needs.

grid.title: Wellness & Preventive Care
grid.description: Annual check-ups, screenings, and immunizations to keep you healthy.

grid.title: Urgent & Emergency Care
grid.description: Immediate care when you need it most, from urgent care to emergency room visits.

grid.title: Mental Health Services
grid.description: Comprehensive mental health support including counseling and therapy.

grid.title: Virtual Care Platform
grid.description: 24/7 access to licensed physicians through our telemedicine platform.

benefits.title: Save Money Every Month
benefits.description: Reduce your healthcare costs by 40-60% compared to traditional insurance premiums while maintaining quality coverage.

benefits.title: Choose Your Providers
benefits.description: No network restrictions mean you can see any doctor, specialist, or hospital you prefer anywhere in the country.

benefits.title: Fast Access to Care
benefits.description: Skip long wait times with priority scheduling and 24/7 virtual care access for immediate medical needs.

benefits.title: Transparent Pricing
benefits.description: Know exactly what you'll pay with clear, upfront pricing and no surprise bills or hidden fees.

benefits.title: Community Support
benefits.description: Join a caring community committed to supporting each other's health and wellness journey.

benefits.title: Digital-First Experience
benefits.description: Manage everything through our intuitive mobile app - from submitting expenses to accessing virtual care.

testimonials.name: Mike Rodriguez
testimonials.content: As a freelance graphic designer, I couldn't afford $800/month for insurance. MPB Health gives me better coverage for $180/month. It's been a game-changer for my business and family.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Walsh
testimonials.content: After my husband's company stopped offering insurance, we thought we'd have to choose between healthcare and our mortgage. MPB Health let us keep both. The virtual care is amazing too.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.content: I was skeptical about health sharing at first, but after 2 years with MPB Health, I can't imagine going back to traditional insurance. The savings and simplicity are incredible.
